def polarity(text):
    blob= TextBlob(text)
    blob.sentiment
    polarity= blob.sentiment.polarity
    
    return polarity

def subjectivity(text):
    blob= TextBlob(text)
    blob.sentiment
    subjectivity= blob.sentiment.subjectivity
    
    return subjectivity
